meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a mission.
meanings.sent1: The church organized a missional trip to help those in need.
meanings.sent2: She approached her work with a missional mindset, always focused on the goal.
meanings.sent3: The cat took on a missional attitude, determined to catch the elusive red dot.
meanings.sent4: His missional dedication to environmental causes inspired many to take action.
meanings.sent5: The missional spirit of the team brought them together to achieve their goal.

meanings.definition: Having a strong sense of purpose or calling.
meanings.sent1: The young artist had a missional drive to create meaningful paintings.
meanings.sent2: She felt a missional connection to her volunteer work at the shelter.
meanings.sent3: The dog seemed to have a missional purpose in chasing its tail endlessly.
meanings.sent4: His missional determination to succeed propelled him through challenges.
meanings.sent5: The missional passion in her eyes was evident as she spoke about her dreams.
